overview: The world-famous erotic photographer Richard Kern manages like no other to capture exciting girls in their most intimate moments. Graceful, submissive, casual, provocative and desirable - this film shows the most enchanting amateur models that the New Yorker got in front of the camera on his trip around the world. Not only his fans will make eyes, what Kern has done with these sometimes shy, sometimes perky debutantes.
title: Girls (Extra Shot By Kern)
